Text: RE outside counsel Cc I apologize for not responding yesterday to your question The outside counsel for legal opinions for the Moore offshore funds Moore Global InvestmentsLtd Moore Global Fixed Income Fund Ltd and Moore Emerging Markets Fund Ltd is Graham Thompson Co in Nassau Bahamas The contact at Graham Thompson that handles the relationship is Gilbert A Ward at With regard to Remington Investment Strategies LP the Delaware limited partnership the legal opinion is done by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft in New York The contact at Cadwalader is Jeanne Naughton Carr I am waiting for a reply as to who FIF Masters Fund Ltd uses as their outside counsel I will let you know once i find out Regards Rose Liu Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday January PM To Subject outside counsel Rose You were going to provide with essentials regarding your Bahamian counsel Please forward information Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax

ISDA between Enron MGI Cc Please find attached the latest version of the ISDA document between Enron Moore Global Investments Ltd as well as our comments which can be found below as well as written on the document itself Please note that also included in the fax are some revisions to the legal opinion I will send to you any comments regarding the guaranty once our lawyer has completed his review Schedule Part c Threshold Amount We are willing to accept your proposal for the flat number of million for Enron but we cannot accept million for the Moore Global The majority of our documents are bilateral in nature but we have accepted a ratio thus we have proposed million for Moore Global Please reconsider Part b Documents to be delivered I have added the legal opinion language but I just wanted to confirm that Enron will pay for these requested legal opinions I found out that FIF Master Fund Ltd also uses Graham Thompson as outside counsel Credit Support Annex Paragraph biv Thresholds We are willing to accept a Threshold even though with most of our counterparties we have at least a million threshold On the other hand we find it to be a operational nuisance to have to transfer collateral back and forth with a minimum transfer amount of zero thus we would like to stick with since we do not think is an unreasonable amount of exposure for either party and it would eliminate the nuisance factor Thank you very much for your help in this matter and we look forward to hearing from you Regards Rose faxtif
Comments to Enron Guaranty Cc in my previous email please find attached comments to the Enron Guaranty Thank you for your assistance and we look forward to hearing from you Regards Rose Liu faxtif
Comments to Enron Guaranty Cc in my previous email please find attached comments to the Enron Guaranty Thank you for your assistance and we look forward to hearing from you Regards Rose Liu faxtif
